alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 6:04PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LEE COUNTY THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 604 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Palmona Park to near Cape Coral to near Iona. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, East Dunbar, Matlacha, Palmona Park, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Iona, Cypress Lake, Pine Island Center, McGregor, Pine Manor, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Pineland, St. James City, Villas, San Carlos Park, Saint James City, Page Park, and Punta Rassa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
